moduleDisabled: ⛔ Sorry, %s, but the `%s` module is disabled in this server, so you can't do that! ⛔
missingPermission: ⛔ Sorry, %s, but you don't have permission to do that! ⛔
botMissingPermission: Uh oh! Looks like I've not been set up correctly. I require the `%s` permission to do that. Please contact an admin of this server.
exceptionExecutingCommand: Whoops! Something's gone funny. Please try again in a bit, and if the issue persists join the help discord at https://discord.gg/3SqMvgF
setColorMissingColor: %s, you need to specify a colour. You can get a colour code from https://www.hexcolortool.com/ - you want the code beginning with a #
setColorBadColor: %s, I don't know what color you mean by `%s`. You can get a colour code from https://www.hexcolortool.com/ - you want the code beginning with a #
setColorBadUser: %s, I don't know who to modify, because I don't know who `%s` refers to. If you just want to change your own color, you don't need to specify a user, just a color.
setColorSuccess: Success! The user %s now has the color `%s`
clearColorBadUser: %s, I can't clear the color of `%s` because I don't know who that is.
clearColorSuccess: Success! Removed the color role from %s
clearColorNoColors: I can't clear the color role from %s as they don't have one!
setPrefixMissingPrefix: %s, you need to specify the prefix you want to use.
setPrefixSuccess: %s updated the prefix for this server from %s to %s
clearCommandSyntax: %s, when using the clear chat command, you should specify either a user to clear messages for, a number of messages to delete, or nothing, in which case the last %d messages will be deleted.
clearCommandComplete: %s, I've deleted %d messages from this channel.
